hibernate-mapping.query: FROM LocationConnection ORDER BY pk.location1.name asc, pk.location2.name asc
FROM LocationConnection WHERE pk.location1.id = :location1ID and pk.location2.id = :location2ID or pk.location1.id = :location2ID and pk.location2.id = :location1ID
FROM LocationConnection WHERE ((pk.location1.id = :locationId and pk.location2.name like :locationName) or (pk.location2.id = :locationId and pk.location1.name like :locationName))
